content: so nice about these pumpkins you can really customize it any way you want fingering weight dk aran… it all works and that s it if you have any questions feel free to send me an email at hawaribazaar@gmail com i hope you enjoy knitting your pumpkins and don t forget to tag me in your autumn knitting - corinne hawari bazaar yarn co www hawaribazaar com hawaribazaar@gmail com 2021 corinne hawari | hawari bazaar designs 8 happy knitting 2021 corinne hawari | hawari bazaar designs 9
